page.title: 19THE PARISH MAGAZINE
page.content: The only paper published especially for this area is the {Parish Magazine} which is circulated to 4 parishes in all,and 275 copies are published every month.It is printed in the local school on a Roneo duplicator by a team of volunteers.The cost is met by subscribers who pay 10p for a copy,and by the 3 dozen dvertisers.It contains a monthly letter from the Rector,lists of service times for each{church}also rotas for flower arranging and brass cleaning.In addition to these,many local societies publish their news and advertise their coming events.In this way we can all keep in touch with our local community. There is a religious insert of 2 sheets published by a national religious press in Oxford.
